summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Ravenna Avenue from East 62nd Street to East 63rd Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9500 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode "Payment in Bond"; and repealing Ordinance No. 55661, approved July 10, 1928.
